info.name: SchooliAt Mobile API
info.description:
Complete API collection for SchooliAt Mobile Application (Android/iOS)

Supports three user types:
- TEACHER: Manage classes, students, attendance, homework, and marks
- STUDENT: View attendance, homework, results, timetable, and fees
- EMPLOYEE: Manage schools, vendors, licenses, and system administration

Base URL: https://api.schooliat.com
Note: Auth endpoints are at root level (/auth/*), other endpoints support both legacy (/endpoint) and versioned (/api/v1/endpoint) routes

request.description: Authenticate user and receive JWT token. Roles allowed: TEACHER, STUDENT, EMPLOYEE
Request OTP for various purposes: verification, password-reset, login, deletion
Get list of students filtered by teacher's classes
Mark daily attendance for a student. Status: PRESENT, ABSENT, LATE, HALF_DAY
Mark attendance for multiple students at once
Enter marks for a student in an exam
Calculate and generate results for an exam
Get notes for student's class and subjects
Get syllabus for student's class and subjects
Get file by ID (returns file URL or metadata)
Create a new conversation. Type: DIRECT, GROUP, CLASS, SCHOOL
Send a message in a conversation
Get calendar view with events and holidays
